## getAttribute() function

Retrieve attribute value of a DOM element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getAttribute(page: Page, selector: string, name: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  selector | string | Query selector for the element. |
|  name | string | Attribute name. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

The attribute value
